chart.title: Military spending as a share of GDP
chart.subtitle: Military expenditure divided by gross domestic product, expressed as a percentage. Includes military and civil personnel, operation and maintenance, procurement, military research and development, infrastructure, and aid.

Military expenditure (% of GDP).descriptionShort: Total military expenditure divided by [gross domestic product](#dod:gdp), expressed as a percentage.
descriptionKey: This data includes military and civil personnel, operation and maintenance, procurement, military research and development, infrastructure, and aid. Civil defense and current expenditures for previous military activities are excluded.
